workshoptitle: GPU Accelerated Data Science with NVIDIA RAPIDS

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to the Data Science Service

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create a Project
tutorials.description: Create a project to contain the Data Science Notebooks.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a Notebook Session Running on a GPU
tutorials.description: Create a Notebook Session and launch it on a GPU VM shape.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Install the RAPIDS Conda Environment
tutorials.description: Install the RAPIDS conda environment in the notebook session.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Data Manipulations with RAPIDS cuDF Library
tutorials.description: Learn how to use cuDF to speed up data manipulations on GPU with a simple introductory notebook.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Train Models Faster with the cuML Library
tutorials.description: Train simple ML models faster with cuML with a simple notebook example.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
